title: Frans de Waal: 'Primates are also born with a gender identity'
description: In his book, the Dutch-American primatologist Frans de Waal presents the results of half a century spent observing the habits of great apes. He believes that they are cultural and gendered beings.

title: Fighting gender stereotypes: An emergency in children's sports
description: According to a recent report,  the proportion of French youth reaching recommended levels of physical activity drops sharply by age 11, especially among girls.
